entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Richmond Hill
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:46 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Buttonville Municipal Airport 04:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -9.0°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -10.7°C
Wind: N 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Freezing drizzle or ice pellets early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
